title: Louis Rubin Memorial Approach
description: Built following the fire that destroyed Rensselaer's main building, The Approach overlooks Troy and represents a symbolic link between the City of Troy and Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute.

title: DCC Tech Dump
description: Frequently used, old printers and toner.

title: Low/CII Tech Dump
description: Frequently used, lots of decade old equipment.

title: Union Tech Dump
description: Right outside elevator in garage. Working PC found once in a while.

title: JEC Tech Dump
description: Most used tech dump. Lots of toners and printers, lot of old CRTs and other things.

title: MILL Lab
description: Manufacturing learning environment with industry-grade equipment.

title: The Whale
description: A cute place to take a date. When you speak into the turret, the shape of it echoes what you say with a 1 second delay.
